name: V Rising: Razer Night Serpent Pack
summary:
The Razer Night Serpent Pack was a limited promotional giveaway that unlocked 4 item crafting recipes for the Tier 1 Cape (short): Razer Serpent Wrap, Tier 2 Cape (medium): Razer Serpent Veil, Tier 3 Cape (long): Razer Serpent Mantle and Headwear: Razer Hood.

The new items can be obtained without the pack's crafting recipes as extra rare loot drops added to the game with it's announcement.

The giveaway was announced in June 2022 and repeated around Halloween the same year. The Tier 2 and 3 crafting recipes were tied to the game's normal progression, so the bosses Beatrice the Tailor and Sir Magnus the Overseer had to be defeated before they could be used.
